questions.text: Does the website look professional and is it aesthetically pleasing?
questions.affirmative: It brought a tear to my eye. :’)
questions.negative: It brought a tear to my eye. :’(
It’s like Comic Sans and Papyrus had a baby.

questions.text: Is there a call to action (CTA) or key message in the main banner?
questions.negative: Not even if you squint and tilt your head.

questions.text: Is there a contact number on the top of the website?
questions.negative: I’d have more luck getting digits from a supermodel.

questions.text: Is it immediately clear what the business does?
questions.negative: Yes: make people leave their website quickly.

questions.text: Can you tell what the primary action or goal the website is asking for?
questions.negative: Their goal must be to drive visitors away.

questions.text: Can you tell what the secondary action/s the website is asking for?
questions.negative: Just the void staring back at me.

questions.text: Is the menu navigation logical and easy to move around the website?
questions.negative: I just wanted to use the word “labyrinthine”.

questions.text: Are there social media share buttons?
questions.negative: More like ANTIsocial, am I right?!

questions.text: Is there a lead capture form on every page?
questions.negative: They’re clearly relying on magic instead.
